name: 9altitudes Ruleset
description: These rules must be respected by all the AL code written within the company.

rules.justification: Not a problem (probably fixed in later versions of compiler), The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
Not always a problem, Parameter 'x' is declared by reference but never changed in method 'y'.
Not a problem (probably fixed in later versions of compiler), The file 'x' has an incorrect name. The valid name is 'y'.al.
